content: सोत्क, सोत्कंठ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Ardently longing, impatiently eager, anxious; as in सोत्कंठमालिंगनम्. {@--2@} Regreatful. {@--3@} Bewailing, sorrowing. --ठं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} With ardent or eager longing, anxiously; प्रोड्डीयेव बलाकया सरभसं सोत्कंठमालिंगितः <ls>Mk. 5. 23.</ls> {@--2@} Regretfully, sorrowfully.
